subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With the Yankees in a scoring slump, the starting pitcher David Phelps knew what a tiebreaking, three-run homer by the Royals’ Salvador Perez likely meant for his team — another defeat.
snippet: With the Yankees in a scoring slump, the starting pitcher David Phelps knew what a tiebreaking, three-run homer by the Royals’ Salvador Perez likely meant for his team — another defeat.
